rows.label: tlk41300021_07_msg0001
rows.name:
Do you know of the ancient Gulan
Ritual of Plenty?

rows.label: tlk41300021_07_msg0002
rows.name:
The ritual performed every year
in Kizan Valley?

rows.label: tlk41300021_07_msg0003
rows.name:
Each year, a maiden is chosen to
travel to the sacred grounds and
pray for a good year's harvest.

rows.label: tlk41300021_07_msg0004
rows.name:
Those sacred grounds lie deep
in Kizan Valley.

rows.label: tlk41300021_07_msg0005
rows.name:
However, it seems that some kind of
suspicious interlopers have recently
been intruding upon the valley.

rows.label: tlk41300021_07_msg0006
rows.name:
We cannot allow such a sacred
place to be defiled.

rows.label: tlk41300021_07_msg0007
rows.name:
Would you lend us your aid to
expel these interlopers?

rows.label: tlk41300021_07_msg0008
rows.name:
Thank you so much.
Please take care.
